pages.text: $(li)Cactus are plants that will hurt any creature who dates to approach them.$(br)$(li)You can use Cactus to craft $(l)Cactus Batch$(), and the $(l:patchouli:armors/cactus_armor)Cactus Armor$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(br)$(li)You can obtain $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/quark/cactus_paste)Cactus Paste$(/l) Smelting a Cactus in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l).

$(li)Cactus can be found in dry areas, like $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/desert)Deserts$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can plant this block in a Sand block.$(br)$(li)It grows even if the newly-grown block would immediately break due to adjacent blocks.
